website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for Hatchimals-obsessed 4-year-olds, this multipack bundle offers several CollEGGtibles for the price.
pros: Good-sized assortment of small eggs in multiple packs
Hatch reliably with just a few minutes of petting or rolling around
cons: Eggs change color and hatch too quickly for some
Must be “hatched” manually once the heart on the outside changes color
Very pricey for their small size

customer_reviews.title: These are apparently the baby hatchimals, that's what my ...
customer_reviews.text: These are apparently the baby hatchimals, that's what my daughter told me when she opened them. She wanted the bigger or "adult" hatchimals that she told me she's seen playing with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila E.

customer_reviews.title: Cute product.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was thrilled. We had a lot of fun hatching them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved them
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these. Out 3 year old Granddaughter loves these and cherishes each one that she gets. So I get her some every now and then. When this popped up and I saw the discounted price I jumped on them. She opened them this past Saturday. She got 2 rare and 1 very rare for her collection. Loved the expression on her face when she realized what she got. The excitement in her voice is enough to melt this Grandma's heart.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Kaye Tamez

customer_reviews.title: Great for 4 year old but not younger children
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves these! the only thing I do not like is how many pieces they turn into. Not a product for a child that likes to put things in their mouth but my 4 year old niece cannot get enough of these!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved these for a stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved these for a stocking stuffer. She was really surprised by this one particular collectable egg she found in this package.
customer_reviews.author: R&R

customer_reviews.title: ... the surprise Colleggtibles package to see what is was like and its the cutest ever
customer_reviews.text: I opened the surprise Colleggtibles package to see what is was like and its the cutest ever!!! My youngest will love these on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Paid too much.
customer_reviews.text: These were cute, however I found it at about half the price at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Raylene Kinyon

customer_reviews.title: She enjoyed rubbing the eggs until they were ready to hatch
customer_reviews.text: Daughter had wanted these for quite some time. She enjoyed rubbing the eggs until they were ready to hatch. I definitely recommend these hatchimals to anyone with girls for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter it’s not often that I get this little girl what she wants. But she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Jack Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Why bother?
customer_reviews.text: Waist of money. Simply a fad. Kid will loose small toys inside and if you have a little one, definitely a choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Tanasha

customer_reviews.title: seems over priced
customer_reviews.text: I essentially over paid for miniature figurines that did not completely hatch as advertised. The hatchimals remind me of the 50 cents grocery store machine mystery toys from the 1980 and 1990s.
customer_reviews.author: gar

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what description said. Great value for the price. My 9 year old grand daughter loved these.
customer_reviews.author: Inman

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 and they were broken when we opened ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and they were broken when we opened them up on Christmas morning....wow... It was disappointing and embarrassing. No key was in the box either.
customer_reviews.author: D.Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Fun Little Thingys
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what these things are, but my grand daughter wanted them for Christmas so I ordered them. She seems to love them. And that's all that matters to me.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine B.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter. It absolutely made her smile at Christmas so how can that be bad?
customer_reviews.author: Zkidd

customer_reviews.title: Legit and 1000!%%%
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was beyond surprised! She cracked each one open! It’s 100% legit!
customer_reviews.author: jeaninelk868

customer_reviews.title: Costly but kids love them
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids are crazy about these things. I think they are a waste of money, but they are worth the price for the happiness they bring to the kids. This set had 8 animals (7 eggs and one extra), so a better deal than some other sets. Hopefully, we will satisfy the Hatchimals cravings without having to buy the large ones which are obscenely expensive. Another collecting fad. I wish I had thought of it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Egg Excitement of little Critters
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is in love with hatchimals! These are little baby ones; but, he never loses the excitement of what's inside the egg! He plays with these and he's 5 year's old and into minecraft and other computer games; but, when it comes to these hatchimals, he shows the little kid side of himself!!
customer_reviews.author: tlc

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a gift. Don't know if it was liked or not.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Bushroe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter loved it and was so excited for them to hatch.
customer_reviews.author: georgia fitzjarrell

customer_reviews.title: She was happy to hatch them all
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves these things. She was happy to hatch them all.
customer_reviews.author: blues4bob

customer_reviews.title: Hatchimals are Pricey
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved these. I thought they were expensive for what was in the eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Peter P

customer_reviews.title: ... give it to her I'm sure she'll be very happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my granddaughter and when I see her to give it to her I'm sure she'll be very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne

customer_reviews.title: who just loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for a special needs child, who just loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Mulrooney

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kids occupied
customer_reviews.text: Best gift for a child under 10 in my opinion. My daughters love these little things.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My nieces love this and still playing with it since Christmas, worth buying

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loved them. Great job & fast shipping!!

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy them
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter really enjoyed hatching everyone of them. Just a little messy with the discarded shell.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: All is well. Thanks for getting this here before Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Burgess

customer_reviews.title: as long as shes happy I am Happy
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter wanted a second one...as long as shes happy I am Happy !
customer_reviews.author: ROBIN  SHANTIE

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces loved these...they are very popular and come packaged perfectly
customer_reviews.author: mendesalyssa

customer_reviews.title: Supply & Demand
customer_reviews.text: hatchimals became so popular where I live (Miami area) and because of supply and demand, they are really too expensive. My 5yr old kept asking for them and I can see the main reason was just to hatch open the eggs. After that, she didn't really care about what was inside. If the price was a little cheaper, probably would have been worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these hatchimals. Came on time, as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bundle
customer_reviews.text: We got this for Christmas for my 9 year old. The amount of eggs you got for the price was awesome! Definitely worth it for your little hatchanimal fan!

customer_reviews.title: My child was pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Most: my child LOVED them. Least: I thought it was the large egg.

customer_reviews.title: The way it was hatched

customer_reviews.title: NOT Season 1
customer_reviews.text: See pic. Barcode says Season 1, but these were all Season 2.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for multiple Girls!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughters absolutely love them. Great way to keep 3 ladies happy!
customer_reviews.author: James Doran

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great size
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, and a great gift for two of my daughters! Perfect size, and it was fun to discover the content of each little egg. I didn't want to pay for the more expensive, bigger toy this line offers, as I figured my girls would tire of it, as they tend to do. This was just right to fulfill their want for the Hatchimal toy!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hamrick

customer_reviews.title: a gift hit...
customer_reviews.text: geeze, my granddaughter loved this gift...and after the fun of hatching them, she still plays with them...she loves small figures and creatures...she is 3 and added these into her minnies playhouse set as pets...
customer_reviews.author: shasta

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but would recommend getting the tree house with them to have them ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but would recommend getting the tree house with them to have them live it it otherwise there kinda boring for a 10 yr old

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I'm really not impressed by these.. There's little creatures worth less than a dollar inside the non-reusable egg.. junk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Super quick shipping and everything came that I expected! Can't wait to wrap them to put under the tree!

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved them
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey for what they are... tiny, plastic figurines. However, the novelty of hatching them from the egg and watching the heart change color made it exciting to open. My daughter loves hatching them!!

customer_reviews.title: Not very thrilled. All 3 packages came ripped and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very thrilled. All 3 packages came ripped and I almost had a heart attack thinking there wasn’t anything in them. Thank god there’s nothing missing. Hopefully I can tape them back to where my daughter doesn’t notice.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: About to give up on toyd
customer_reviews.text: These are annoying. Changes color/mood to guickly. By the time you pat their head, they have changed their sound, color and mood, so you have to change your response.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but I want my orders delivered to garage door ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice but I want my orders delivered to garage door side. I believe I put that in my profile. LOVE working with amazon.

product_meta.title: Hatchimals Colleggtibles Season 1 4-pack + bonus, 2-pack + nest, 1 blind SET (random assortment)
product_meta.description: This gift set includes one of each of the follow packs from season 1: 1 pack blind bad 2-pack + nest 4-pack + bonus figure Items are chosen at random during packing.
